attributes.action: press criminal charges against all MP's who have made false expenses claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of current MP's expenses claims I believe criminal charges should be bought against theses people just as the government would if someone fruadulently made a benifits claim. How can somebody forget the mrtgage they are claiming for has been paid off for a whole year!!!!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
